text: Socialist Youth of Galicia () is the youth organisation of the Socialists' Party of Galicia (PSdeG). The first socialist youth groups appeared in the Galician cities between 1903 and 1904. ==References== ==External links== *Official website Category:1903 establishments in Spain Category:Spanish Socialist Workers' Party Category:Youth wings of political parties in Spain Category:Youth wings of social democratic parties
title: Socialist Youth of Galicia
